column1: definition. A party to a litigation is said to be guilty of abuse of process of the Court,

i
n
 
any of the following cases:-

(
1
)
 
Gaining an unfair advantage by the use of a rule of procedure.

(
2
)
 
Contempt of the authority of the Court by a party or stranger.

(
3
)
 
Fraud or collusion in Court proceedings as between parties.

(
5
)
 
Resorting to and encouraging multiplicity of proceedings.
